version_description: Fixes a crash affecting some users when pressing the Next button.
Save customers directly to your Stripe account to reference later as well as create charges for existing customers.
You can now send a receipt or refund a charge immediately after collecting the payment.
We've improved the way that your app Settings are handled and have more presets and options coming soon! We've also fixed some crashes that were affecting a small subset of users.
Fixes an issue with card declines not showing the proper error messaging.
Fixes a bug with the card readers submitting invalid data.
Fixes an issue with existing customers not showing up in the list after being saved on a previous charge.
Bug fixes and performance enhancements.
To help protect your account from fraudulent charges, we've made some significant changes to the way charging happens. Luckily for you, it was all under the hood and nothing changes in your workflow!
Fixed a bug with characters displaying twice in the description text field.
Fixes an issue with customers list only showing a subset of all customers.
Browse your Stripe account Payouts directly from the app!
Fixes issues for older devices (running iOS 10.3.X). The Next/Charge buttons will now always display. The credit card view will also scale the text size for smaller screens.
Display and crash fixes specific to iPads.
Fixes some issues with card readers not processing card data properly.
Mostly just bug fixes and stability improvements. Also, we've upgraded the app to use the latest and greatest version of the Stripe API to enable us to add more features in the coming months!
We regularly update the app to fix bugs and crashes.
Adds additional information for troubleshooting issues. And as always, we squashed a few bugs in the meantime.
Bug fixes and performance improvements.
Upgrade for iOS12, with added stability improvements!
To help protect against fraud, a zip/postal code is required for charges.
Fixes a bug with the Charge button disappearing unintentionally.
Fixes issues with zip/postal code validation and certain zero-decimal currencies unsupported by Stripe.
Fixes issues with Hong Kong postal codes, customer receiving receipts and validation of pre-populated cards from customers & card readers.
Fixes an issue with adding new customers and zip codes.
Fixes an issue with non-US countries not be able to live scan credit cards with the camera.
Contains minor bug fixes and performance improvements.

We're pleased to be one of the first Verified Partners to integrate with the new Stripe Terminal card readers. With this new offering, you can use the BBPOS Chipper 2X BT, which is small enough to fit in your pocket! The Bluetooth enabled card reader that supports EMV as well as magstripe.

With NFC and close proximity payments, you can now accept new forms of payment such as: Apple Pay, Android Pay, Samsung Pay, VISA Paywave, MasterCard PayPass, AMEX ExpressPay and Discover D-PAS.

Get your card readers today: https://paymentforstripe.com/order
Bug fixes and performance improvements.
Fixes an issue with Orders not properly sending receipts.

New Settings to control the functionality of your app! Toggle the zip/postal code requirement on or off (helpful for those selling overseas), as well as hide Recent Charges and Payouts from your employees.
Improvements for those using the Stripe Terminal card reader. Order yours today to reduce your transaction rate to 2.7% + 5c via Stripe. https://paymentforstripe.com/order
Fixes a bug with customers still requiring a zip/postal code, even when the app doesn't require it.
Support for pre-authorizations with credit card readers.
Bug fixes and improvements to account management system, letting you know when there is an issue with your account.
Bug fixes and performance improvements.
Fixes some common issues with Stripe Terminal, including swipe errors and handling of customers.
Fixes a bug with sending receipts after charges when using the card reader. Now you can search & view all of your Products and Customers, without needing to paginate.

Updates to orders! An email address is no longer required to create an order and products marked as shippable (in your Stripe account) no longer require a shipping address when sold through the app! Enjoy!
Support both landscape and portrait orientations on iPad.

Now with support for Sales Tax! Theres two ways to set sales tax, for the two ways you can collect charges. When manually inputting an amount, you can set your Sales Tax rate (percentage) in the app Settings. The alternative is when you're creating an Order from adding Products, you'll need to set the tax rate in your Stripe Dashboard.
Allow for updating the firmware of Stripe Terminal card readers as well as tweaks to the way currencies are handled.
Fixes an issue with Orders and some users seeing an Invalid Positive Integer error.
Bug fixes, performance and stability improvements.

Two big updates:

1) We're SCA compliant (for those folks in the EU). This update is mandatory for anyone outside the US.
2) You can now ask for a tip after you create a charge!
Adds support for connected hardware keyboards and fixes a bug with order descriptions not being set properly.
We've added grouping to your Stripe Products, so you can more easily differentiate between the various SKUs you're selling.
Subscription support is here! Now you can easily enroll your customers into daily, weekly, monthly and yearly subscriptions directly from the app.
We fixed a bug that prevented support for tax percentages above 9.99%.
Added additional searching capability for customers (last 4 of card, description, email, name, id, etc).
Bug fixes and performance improvements.
We periodically make updates to the app to fix minor bugs and improve overall performance.
We periodically make updates to the app to fix minor bugs and improve overall performance.
New language localizations for all native languages supported by Stripe!
Bug fixes and performance improvements.
Bug fixes and performance improvements.
New icon, same great app! We've also included some additional improvements to many parts of the app.
Updates for the latest Stripe Terminal (US only)
We continually make updates to the app to fix bugs and improve performance.
Fix an issue with authentication, experienced by new users.
Fixes issues with statement descriptions and sort orders of products/plans.
Adds additional tipping and gratuity options.
Fixes an issue with tax formatting for locales using a comma instead of a period for decimals.
Fixes a bug in the login flow.
Additional control for enterprise users and their employees.
We've streamlined the way that Customers are created when using Stripe Terminal. In addition, we've made a ton of improvements to how the app works internally.
Fixes an issue when processing a transaction with MasterCard
Fixes an issue with selecting existing customers and card details
Several bug fixes and performance improvements.
Several bug fixes and performance improvements.
Fixes a critical bug with authentication introduced in version 5.1.
Improvements for Payment Enterprise users.
Just a boring update with a few bug fixes. More features coming very soon!

Invoice now, get paid later. The app now has full support for Stripe Invoices, including line item pricing, due dates and the ability to send a link via email for your customers to pay later. All invoices created from the app are fully customizable in your Stripe Dashboard.
Fixes an issue with shipping names (when creating a customer), a crash and a due date bug with invoices.
Minor bug fixes and performance improvements.
Various bug fixes and stability improvements.
Bug fixes and performance improvements.
